import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-skills-box-list', templateUrl: './skills-box-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./skills-box-list.component.css'] }) export class SkillsBoxListComponent { listOfListOfSkills = [ ["Bases de données", "database.png", ["MySql", "Symfony"]], ["Langues", "database.png", ["Français", "Anglais"]], ] }
